channel.title: What would you say is the most important thing in music production?
channel.description: When you make a song what is the driving force and what is your priorities in the making of a song?

item.title: What would you say is the most important thing in music production?
item.dc:creator: anon2811266
item.description:
Nothing cuz I can’t create anything decent.

Most of the stuff is just things that I work hard on and people won’t even care to listen…

This is not a self promo thing

And no offense to people that don’t listen to it…

item.dc:creator: Zeph
item.description:

item.source: What would you say is the most important thing in music production?

item.title: What would you say is the most important thing in music production?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
It may be cheesy to say this, but I’d say soul is. The sense of connection you make with your sound and song is seriously what makes it worth producing music, at least for myself. I pour out my time, effort and creativity into something, and I try my best to make sure that comes through entirely. It’s not an exact science, obviously. But I do my damndest to make it happen.

Read full topic
